R0_StudyID.name: StudyID
R0_StudyID.description: Unique 6-digit identifier for each participant in the study.

R0_BiologicalParentsUnknown.name: Q14_1
R0_BiologicalParentsUnknown.question: Are your biological parents unknown to you?
R0_BiologicalParentsUnknown.description: Indicates whether the participant does not know who their biological parents are.

R0_FatherFirstName.name: Q14_2First
R0_FatherFirstName.question: What is your father's first name?
R0_FatherFirstName.description: Father's first name as reported by the participant.

R0_FatherSurname.name: Q14_2Surn
R0_FatherSurname.question: What is your father's surname?
R0_FatherSurname.description: Father's current or last known surname.

R0_FatherDOB_Day.name: Q14_2DOBd
R0_FatherDOB_Day.question: What is your father's date of birth? - Day
R0_FatherDOB_Day.description: Calendar day (1-31) for father's date of birth.

R0_FatherDOB_Month.name: Q14_2DOBm
R0_FatherDOB_Month.question: What is your father's date of birth? - Month
R0_FatherDOB_Month.description: Calendar month (1-12) for father's date of birth.

R0_FatherDOB_Year.name: Q14_2DOBy
R0_FatherDOB_Year.question: What is your father's date of birth? - Year

R0_FatherDOB_Unknown.name: Q14_2DOBdn
R0_FatherDOB_Unknown.question: What is your father's date of birth? - Don't know
R0_FatherDOB_Unknown.description: Flag indicating the participant does not know their father's date of birth.

R0_FatherHeightFeet.name: Q14_2feet
R0_FatherHeightFeet.question: How tall is/was your father? - Feet
R0_FatherHeightFeet.description: Father's height as reported in feet component.

R0_FatherHeightInches.name: Q14_2inches
R0_FatherHeightInches.question: How tall is/was your father? - Inches

R0_FatherBirthCountry.name: Q14_2_1_1
R0_FatherBirthCountry.question: In what country was your father born? (UK/Other/Not known)

R0_FatherBirthCountryOther.name: Q14_2_2
R0_FatherBirthCountryOther.question: If other, please specify the country where your father was born.
R0_FatherBirthCountryOther.description: Free-text country name if father's country of birth is not the UK.

R0_FatherCancerHistory.name: Q14_2_3_1
R0_FatherCancerHistory.question: Has your father ever had any type of cancer, leukaemia, Hodgkin's disease or lymphoma?
R0_FatherCancerHistory.description: Summary flag of any reported cancer for the father (any site).

FatherCancers.name: FatherCancers
FatherCancers.description: List of cancer diagnoses reported for the father.

R0_FatherCancer_Num.name: R0_FatherCancer_Num
R0_FatherCancer_Num.question: Instance of cancer that the participant's father had.

R0_FatherCancerType.name: R0_FatherCancerType
R0_FatherCancerType.question: If yes, what type of cancer did your father have?
R0_FatherCancerType.description: Reported cancer site/type for the father (free text or coded downstream).

R0_FatherCancerYear.name: R0_FatherCancerYear
R0_FatherCancerYear.question: In what year was your father's cancer diagnosed?
R0_FatherCancerYear.description: Calendar year of father's cancer diagnosis for this record.

R0_FatherCancerYearUnknown.name: R0_FatherCancerYearUnknown
R0_FatherCancerYearUnknown.question: In what year was your father's cancer diagnosed? - Don't know
R0_FatherCancerYearUnknown.description: Flag indicating the diagnosis year for this cancer is unknown.

R0_FatherVitalStatus.name: Q14_2alive_1
R0_FatherVitalStatus.question: Is your father still alive? (Alive, Dead, Don't know)
R0_FatherVitalStatus.description: Father's vital status at the time of questionnaire.

R0_FatherDOD_Day.name: Q14_2dth_d
R0_FatherDOD_Day.question: If deceased, what was your father's date of death? - Day

R0_FatherDOD_Month.question: If deceased, what was your father's date of death? - Month

R0_FatherDOD_Year.name: Q14_2dth_y
R0_FatherDOD_Year.question: If deceased, what was your father's date of death? - Year

R0_FatherDOD_Unknown.name: Q14_2_dn3
R0_FatherDOD_Unknown.question: If deceased, what was your father's date of death? - Don't know
R0_FatherDOD_Unknown.description: Flag indicating the participant does not know the date of father's death.

R0_FatherCauseOfDeath.question: What was your father's cause of death?
R0_FatherCauseOfDeath.description: Free-text cause of death for the father, if deceased and reported.

R0_MotherHeightInches.name: Q14_3inches
R0_MotherHeightInches.question: How tall is/was your mother? - Inches

R0_MotherCancerHistory.name: Q14_3_3_1
R0_MotherCancerHistory.question: Has your mother ever had any type of cancer, leukaemia, Hodgkin's disease or lymphoma?

R0_MotherCancer_Num.question: Instance of cancer that the mother had.

R0_MotherDOD_Month.question: If deceased, what was your mother's date of death? - Month

R0_MotherDOD_Year.question: If deceased, what was your mother's date of death? - Year
R0_MotherDOD_Year.description: Calendar year of mother's death if applicable.

R0_MotherDOD_Unknown.question: If deceased, what was your mother's date of death? - Don't know

R0_MotherCauseOfDeath.name: Q14_3_cause
R0_MotherCauseOfDeath.question: What was your mother's cause of death?
R0_MotherCauseOfDeath.description: Cause of death for the mother, if deceased and reported.

R0_GrandparentUK_MM.name: Q14_4_UK_MM
R0_GrandparentUK_MM.question: In what country were your grandparents born? (UK) - Mother's mother
R0_GrandparentUK_MM.description: For the maternal grandmother (mother's mother): indicator whether her country of birth was the UK.

R0_GrandparentCountry_MM.question: If other, please specify the country where Mother's mother was born.
R0_GrandparentCountry_MM.description: For the maternal grandmother: country of birth when not the UK.

R0_GrandparentCountryDN_MM.name: Q14_4_DN_MM
R0_GrandparentCountryDN_MM.question: Do not know the country where Mother's mother was born.
R0_GrandparentCountryDN_MM.description: For the maternal grandmother: flag indicating the country of birth is not known.

R0_GrandparentUK_MF.name: Q14_4_UK_MF
R0_GrandparentUK_MF.question: In what country were your grandparents born? (UK) - Mother's father
R0_GrandparentUK_MF.description: For the maternal grandfather (mother's father): indicator that his country of birth was the UK.

R0_GrandparentCountry_MF.name: Q14_4_OC_MF
R0_GrandparentCountry_MF.question: If other, please specify the country where Mother's father was born.
R0_GrandparentCountry_MF.description: For the maternal grandfather: country of birth when not the UK.

R0_GrandparentCountryDN_MF.name: Q14_4_DN_MF
R0_GrandparentCountryDN_MF.question: Do not know the country where Mother's father was born.
R0_GrandparentCountryDN_MF.description: For the maternal grandfather: flag indicating the country of birth is not known.

R0_GrandparentUK_FM.question: In what country were your grandparents born? (UK) - Father's mother
R0_GrandparentUK_FM.description: For the paternal grandmother (father's mother): indicator that her country of birth was the UK.

R0_GrandparentCountry_FM.name: Q14_4_OC_FM
R0_GrandparentCountry_FM.question: If other, please specify the country where Father's mother was born.
R0_GrandparentCountry_FM.description: For the paternal grandmother: free-text country of birth when not the UK.

R0_GrandparentCountryDN_FM.name: Q14_4_DN_FM
R0_GrandparentCountryDN_FM.question: Do not know the country where Father's mother was born.
R0_GrandparentCountryDN_FM.description: For the paternal grandmother: flag indicating the country of birth is not known.

R0_GrandparentUK_FF.name: Q14_4_UK_FF
R0_GrandparentUK_FF.question: In what country were your grandparents born? (UK) - Father's father
R0_GrandparentUK_FF.description: For the paternal grandfather (father's father): indicator that his country of birth was the UK.

R0_GrandparentCountry_FF.name: Q14_4_OC_FF
R0_GrandparentCountry_FF.question: If other, please specify the country where Father's father was born.

R0_GrandparentCountryDN_FF.name: Q14_4_DN_FF
R0_GrandparentCountryDN_FF.question: Do not know the country where Father's father was born.

R0_GrandparentBreastCancer.name: Q14_5_1_1
R0_GrandparentBreastCancer.question: Have any of your grandparents had breast cancer?
R0_GrandparentBreastCancer.description: Summary indicator of whether any of the participant's four grandparents (maternal grandmother, maternal grandfather, paternal grandmother, paternal grandfather) are reported to have had breast cancer.

R0_GrandparentBreastCancerWho.name: Q14_5_2_1
R0_GrandparentBreastCancerWho.question: If any of your grandparents had breast cancer, which grandparent(s) was it?
R0_GrandparentBreastCancerWho.description: Specifies which grandparent(s) had breast cancer. Code 0 indicates that more than one grandparent applied.

R0_NumBrothers.name: Q14_6
R0_NumBrothers.question: How many brothers do you have?
R0_NumBrothers.description: Count of living and deceased biological brothers.

R0_NumSisters.name: Q14_7
R0_NumSisters.question: How many sisters do you have?
R0_NumSisters.description: Count of living and deceased biological sisters.

Siblings.name: Siblings
Siblings.description: Per-sibling details (relationship, shared parent for half-siblings, DOB, and cancer history). Use this array to capture up to 13 siblings.

R0_Sibling_Num.name: R0_Sibling_Num
R0_Sibling_Num.question: Number of sibling of the participant.

R0_SiblingRelation.name: R0_SiblingRelation
R0_SiblingRelation.question: What is this sibling's relationship to you?
R0_SiblingRelation.description: Sibling's relationship (e.g., brother, sister, half-brother, half-sister). Use in combination with SiblingParentShared for half-siblings.

R0_SiblingParentShared.name: R0_SiblingParentShared
R0_SiblingParentShared.question: If a half-sibling, which parent do you share?
R0_SiblingParentShared.description: For half-siblings, indicates whether the shared parent is the mother or the father.

R0_SiblingDOB_Day.name: R0_SiblingDOB_Day
R0_SiblingDOB_Day.question: What is your sibling's date of birth? - Day
R0_SiblingDOB_Day.description: Calendar day (1-31) of the sibling's birth.

R0_SiblingDOB_Month.name: R0_SiblingDOB_Month
R0_SiblingDOB_Month.question: What is your sibling's date of birth? - Month
R0_SiblingDOB_Month.description: Calendar month (1-12) of the sibling's birth.

R0_SiblingDOB_Year.name: R0_SiblingDOB_Year
R0_SiblingDOB_Year.question: What is your sibling's date of birth? - Year
R0_SiblingDOB_Year.description: Calendar year of the sibling's birth.

R0_SiblingDOB_Unknown.name: R0_SiblingDOB_Unknown
R0_SiblingDOB_Unknown.question: What is your sibling's date of birth? - Don't know
R0_SiblingDOB_Unknown.description: Flag indicating the sibling's date of birth is unknown.

R0_SiblingCancerHistory.name: R0_SiblingCancerHistory
R0_SiblingCancerHistory.question: Has this sibling ever had any type of cancer, leukaemia, Hodgkin's disease or lymphoma?
R0_SiblingCancerHistory.description: Summary flag for any malignant disease reported for this sibling. Use the per-sibling fields below for details when applicable.

R0_SiblingCancerType.name: R0_SiblingCancerType
R0_SiblingCancerType.question: If yes, what type of cancer did your sibling have?
R0_SiblingCancerType.description: Reported cancer site/type for this sibling.

R0_SiblingCancerYear.name: R0_SiblingCancerYear
R0_SiblingCancerYear.question: In what year was your sibling's cancer diagnosed?
R0_SiblingCancerYear.description: Calendar year of the sibling's cancer diagnosis if known.

R0_SiblingCancerYearUnknown.name: R0_SiblingCancerYearUnknown
R0_SiblingCancerYearUnknown.question: In what year was your sibling's cancer diagnosed? - Don't know
R0_SiblingCancerYearUnknown.description: Flag indicating the diagnosis year for this sibling's cancer is unknown.

R0_ChildCancerHistory.name: Q14_14_1
R0_ChildCancerHistory.question: Have any of your children ever had any type of cancer, including Hodgkin's disease, leukemia, or lymphoma?
R0_ChildCancerHistory.description: Flag indicating whether any of the participant's children have ever had cancer.

ChildrenCancer.name: ChildrenCancer
ChildrenCancer.description: Per-child details for cancer history (up to 3 children). Use this array only when at least one child with cancer is reported.

R0_ChildCancer_Num.name: R0_ChildCancer_Num
R0_ChildCancer_Num.question: Number of child that had cancer.

R0_Child_CancerWho.name: R0_Child_CancerWho
R0_Child_CancerWho.question: If yes, who among you children had cancer?
R0_Child_CancerWho.description: Description of child by participant who had cancer.

R0_Child_DOB_Day.name: R0_Child_DOB_Day
R0_Child_DOB_Day.question: If yes, what is your child's date of birth (who had cancer)? - Day
R0_Child_DOB_Day.description: Calendar day (1-31) of the child's birth.

R0_Child_DOB_Month.name: R0_Child_DOB_Month
R0_Child_DOB_Month.question: If yes, what is your child's date of birth (who had cancer)? - Month
R0_Child_DOB_Month.description: Calendar month (1-12) of the child's birth.

R0_Child_DOB_Year.name: R0_Child_DOB_Year
R0_Child_DOB_Year.question: If yes, what is your child's date of birth (who had cancer)? - Year
R0_Child_DOB_Year.description: Calendar year of the child's birth.

R0_ChildDOB_Unknown.name: Q14_14DOBdn
R0_ChildDOB_Unknown.question: Do you not know your child's date of birth?
R0_ChildDOB_Unknown.description: Flag indicating the participant does not know this child's date of birth.

R0_ChildCancerType.name: Q14_14type
R0_ChildCancerType.question: What type of cancer did your child have?
R0_ChildCancerType.description: Reported cancer site/type for this child.

R0_ChildCancerYear.name: Q14_14diag
R0_ChildCancerYear.question: In what year was your child's cancer diagnosed?
R0_ChildCancerYear.description: Calendar year of the child's cancer diagnosis.

R0_ChildCancerYearUnknown.name: Q14_14TYPdn
R0_ChildCancerYearUnknown.question: Do you not know the year when your child's cancer was diagnosed?
R0_ChildCancerYearUnknown.description: Flag indicating the diagnosis year for this child's cancer is unknown.

R0_DistantRelativesBreastCancer.name: Q14_16_1
R0_DistantRelativesBreastCancer.question: Have any of your more distant blood relatives had breast cancer?
R0_DistantRelativesBreastCancer.description: Summary question indicating whether any distant (non-parent, non-sibling, non-child) blood relatives are reported to have had breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerMotherSister.name: Q14_16which_1
R0_BreastCancerMotherSister.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Mother's sister)
R0_BreastCancerMotherSister.description: Indicates whether the participant reports that their mother's sister had breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerFatherSister.name: Q14_16which_2
R0_BreastCancerFatherSister.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Father's sister)
R0_BreastCancerFatherSister.description: Indicates whether the participant reports that their father's sister had breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerMotherCousin.name: Q14_16which_3
R0_BreastCancerMotherCousin.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Mother's 1st cousin)
R0_BreastCancerMotherCousin.description: Indicates whether the participant reports that a cousin on their mother's side had breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerFatherCousin.name: Q14_16which_4
R0_BreastCancerFatherCousin.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Father's 1st cousin)
R0_BreastCancerFatherCousin.description: Indicates whether the participant reports that a cousin on their father's side had breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerMotherNiece.name: Q14_16which_5
R0_BreastCancerMotherNiece.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Mother's niece)
R0_BreastCancerMotherNiece.description: Indicates whether the participant reports that their mother's niece had breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerFatherNiece.name: Q14_16which_6
R0_BreastCancerFatherNiece.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Father's niece)
R0_BreastCancerFatherNiece.description: Indicates whether the participant reports that their father's niece had breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerGreatGrandmotherM.name: Q14_16which_7
R0_BreastCancerGreatGrandmotherM.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Mother's great grandmother)
R0_BreastCancerGreatGrandmotherM.description: Indicates whether the participant reports that their maternal great-grandmother had breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerGreatGrandmotherF.name: Q14_16which_8
R0_BreastCancerGreatGrandmotherF.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Father's great grandmother)
R0_BreastCancerGreatGrandmotherF.description: Indicates whether the participant reports that their paternal great-grandmother had breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerMotherOtherRelatives.name: Q14_16which_9
R0_BreastCancerMotherOtherRelatives.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Mother's other blood relatives)
R0_BreastCancerMotherOtherRelatives.description: Indicates whether the participant reports any other maternal blood relatives with breast cancer.

R0_BreastCancerFatherOtherRelatives.name: Q14_16which_10
R0_BreastCancerFatherOtherRelatives.question: If yes, which relatives had breast cancer? (Father's other blood relatives)
R0_BreastCancerFatherOtherRelatives.description: Indicates whether the participant reports any other paternal blood relatives with breast cancer.

OtherRelatives.name: OtherRelatives
OtherRelatives.description: Single question about other relatives with breast cancer, repeated three times.

R0_BreastCancerRelative.name: R0_BreastCancerRelative
R0_BreastCancerRelative.question: If other, please specify the blood relative (1)
R0_BreastCancerRelative.description: Free-text relationship label for an 'other' distant blood relative with breast cancer (slot 1).
